Video Guidelines

Upload Video with Captions

Every author should upload the presentation video to YouTube with at least 1080p resolution. Authors need to create captions to improve accessibility for the viewers within the YouTube system. If both the audio and diction meet minimum quality requirements, YouTube might generate captions automatically. If not, authors may create them from scratch. The link here explains how.
